title: Has anybody actually escaped honor 0?
body:
Hey guys, 
Last year, I was quite toxic in my games, which i immediately regret after recieving bans and demotion of honor (honor 0). Since then, I've made it my goal to become a more chilled, enthusiastic player and strive for honor rewards, however ive only managed to make it to checkpoint 2 out of 3 for escaping. I've been playing with a cool head in all situations however i just can't seem to get my honor 1 back. So i was wondering.. has anyone actually made it back to honor 2 after being demoted to honor 0??
